keyword: calories in a sausage biscuit mcdonalds
title: Calories in a McDonald's Sausage Biscuit
meta_description: Discover calories in a sausage biscuit McDonalds, including full nutrition breakdown like fat, carbs, protein, and quick tweaks for variations.
h1: Calories in a McDonald's Sausage Biscuit
assumptions: Standard McDonald's Sausage Biscuit: pork sausage patty on a buttermilk biscuit, no additions like egg or cheese.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and menu changes; values based on standard U.S. McDonald's data. Check app or site for latest.

quick_answer.text: A McDonald's Sausage Biscuit contains 430 calories with 12 g protein and 36 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Add one slice of American cheese
Upgrade to Sausage Biscuit with Egg

faqs.q: How many calories in a sausage biscuit McDonalds?
faqs.a: 430 calories for the standard Sausage Biscuit.

faqs.q: What's the fat content in McDonald's sausage biscuit?
faqs.a: 26 g total fat, including 11 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a McDonald's sausage biscuit?
faqs.a: 840 mg of sodium per sausage biscuit.

faqs.q: Does McDonald's sausage biscuit have fiber?
faqs.a: About 1 g of dietary fiber from the biscuit.

faqs.q: How does the Sausage Biscuit compare to other McDonald's breakfast items?
faqs.a: It's higher in fat than an Egg McMuffin (300 kcal) but similar in calories to a Bacon Biscuit (355 kcal).
